ygData.subject: Re: The Ancient crok in Upper Guk
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I ll believe that when I see it with my own eyes :P~~~~  In my limited experience so far in this case, and yes I do admit that my 48 hrs stint is
ygData.messageBody:
> It doesn't spawn once or twice per 24 hours... it's random. Some people
> have to camp for weeks to get legs, but i've heard of people getting 3
> ancient crocks in an hour and getting legs on two of those
> spawns.

I'll believe that when I see it with my own eyes >:P~~~~ In my limited
experience so far in this case, and yes I do admit that my 48 hrs stint is
considered limited experience, my conclusion bout the ancient croc is that
he is a shy little beast...well maybe not little.
